attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the residents of henlow Bedfordshire strongly disagree to any planning permision  being granted on plot number H103 AND H017 AND H015  hereby order the prime minister and his goverment  to intervene as this will ruin the countryside and turn what is a small village in to a mini town, the residents of this lovely village are distraught at the prospect of having their village turn into a busy town that will bring more traffic to the roads that run through the village and the possibility of causing danger to the children and elderly who have to use the roads to cross. At present there are not any crossings in Newtown, Henlow and the speed limit is constantly being broken. Please sign this petision and keep our village safe.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
